TextString.Name: FurnishingCustomerTooltipIntroID
TextString.String: Different Customers have different tastes beyond food. All customers are going to judge your establishment according to those tastes. If you don't meet their minimum requirements in terms of Ambience, they won't even come inside your restaurant.

TextString.Name: FurnishingCleaningName
TextString.String: Ambience: General

TextString.Name: FurnishingCleaningDescription
TextString.String: Ambience in your restaurant is not only about furnishing, but is also affected by cleanliness, decorations, and air conditioning. It may be costly, but all customers will appreciate these things.

TextString.Name: FurnishingCountryName
TextString.String: Ambience: Rustic

TextString.Name: FurnishingCountryDescription
TextString.String: A simple style reminiscent of rural countrysides and home-cooked meals, Rustic furnishings are often appreciated for their dedication to function over form.

TextString.Name: FurnishingModernName
TextString.String: Ambience: Modern

TextString.Name: FurnishingModernDescription
TextString.String: Designed to combine comfort and a sleek, modern look, Modern furnishings can make any restaurant look upscale.

TextString.Name: FurnishingElegantName
TextString.String: Ambience: Elegant

TextString.Name: FurnishingElegantDescription
TextString.String: As all the rich people say, "If you've got tons of money, flaunt it!". Elegant furnishings are what you expect to see when walking into a mansion.

TextString.Name: RestaurantSizeMultiplierName
TextString.String: Restaurant Size Multiplier

TextString.Name: RestaurantSizeMultiplierDesc
TextString.String: The bigger your restaurant, the more furnishings and decorations you will need! This multiplier affects all Ambience Style scores.

TextString.Name: SmallRestaurantName
TextString.String: Small Restaurant

TextString.Name: MediumRestaurantName
TextString.String: Medium Restaurant

TextString.Name: LargeRestaurantName
TextString.String: Large Restaurant

TextString.Name: VeryLargeRestaurantName
TextString.String: Very Large Restaurant

TextString.Name: HugeRestaurantName
TextString.String: Huge Restaurant

TextString.Name: SmallRestaurantDesc
TextString.String: Having a Small Restaurant you have no negative effects.

TextString.Name: MediumRestaurantDesc
TextString.String: Having a Medium Restaurant you will need two times the usual amount of furnishing to satisfy your customers compared to a Small Restaurant.

TextString.Name: LargeRestaurantDesc
TextString.String: Having a Large Restaurant you will need three times the usual amount of furnishing to satisfy your customers compared to a Small Restaurant.

TextString.Name: VeryLargeRestaurantDesc
TextString.String: Having a Very Large Restaurant you will need four times the usual amount of furnishing to satisfy your customers compared to a Small Restaurant.

TextString.Name: HugeRestaurantDesc
TextString.String: Having a Huge Restaurant you will need five times the usual amount of furnishing to satisfy your customers compared to a Small Restaurant.

TextString.Name: FurnishingAlertName
TextString.String: Ambience value too low!

TextString.Name: FurnishingAlertDesc
TextString.String: Even with world-class chefs and incredible food, certain Customers will never visit your Restaurant unless your Ambience score meets their requirements.

TextString.Name: UIRankingName
TextString.String: Ranking

TextString.Name: UICalendarName
TextString.String: Calendar

TextString.Name: AttractivenessTooltipFurnishingBlock
TextString.String: This Customer type will not visit your Restaurant because the Ambience rating is too low. Invest in furniture that is more expensive and/or more to their taste.

TextString.Name: QuestTutorialDecorName
TextString.String: Furnish your place

TextString.Name: QuestTutorialDecorDescription
TextString.String: You need to spend some money on furniture and decorations and raise your Ambience scores to attract customers. For now, luring Cheapskates in will be enough to make some money, so raise your Ambience scores enough to bring them in!

TextString.Name: QuestTutorialDecorCondition
TextString.String: Satisfy the Cheapskates

TextString.Name: CustomersGoneService
TextString.String: Slow Service:

TextString.Name: CustomersGoneMenu
TextString.String: Unsatisfying Menu:

TextString.Name: MoreFurnishingAlertName
TextString.String: Need More Decorations

TextString.Name: MoreFurnishingAlertDescription
TextString.String: Your restaurant is not clean or attractive enough for people to be willing to come inside! Spend some money on Cleaning Policies or invest in more/better decorations!

TextString.Name: PlantName
TextString.String: Plant

TextString.Name: Plant01Description
TextString.String:
A simple plant, useful for decorating your restaurant. Take care of it or it may die.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Plant02Description
TextString.String:
A simple plant, useful for decorating your restaurant. Only edible for the extremely brave.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Plant03Description
TextString.String:
A simple plant, useful for decorating your restaurant. A reliable, plastic model that looks just like the real thing.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Plant04Description
TextString.String:
A simple plant, useful for decorating your restaurant. This one is particularly non-descript.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Plant05Description
TextString.String:
A simple plant, useful for decorating your restaurant. Plant more trees outside instead of moving plants into restaurants.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Plant06Description
TextString.String:
A simple plant, useful for decorating your restaurant. It's unbe-LEAF-ably hard to write jokes about plants.
{PERKS}

TextStrings.TextString:
Plant07Description A simple plant, useful for decorating your restaurant. It's the greener shade of green.
{PERKS}Condizionatore

TextString.Name: Plant08Description
TextString.String:
A simple plant, useful for decorating your restaurant. Not meant for smoking or inhaling of any kind.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Plant09Description
TextString.String:
A simple plant, useful for decorating your restaurant. So green it almost seems foreign to this planet, as if from a place or a time where nature was never tainted by humanity.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: AirConditioning01Name
TextString.String: Air Conditioner Breezer 500

TextString.Name: AirConditioning01Description
TextString.String:
The Breezer 500 AC Unit uses modern technology to make your restaurant cooler. Also, it will lower the temperature.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: AirConditioning02Name
TextString.String: Air Conditioner CoCoCool

TextString.Name: AirConditioning02Description
TextString.String:
Despite its awful name, the CoCoCool AC Unit actually works quite nicely.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: AirConditioning03Name
TextString.String: Air Conditioner Frost 99

TextString.Name: AirConditioning03Description
TextString.String:
Do you like sweaty armpits? Of course not! No one does! Don't worry, the Frost 99 AC Unit can solve this issue with its high-tech design!
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: AirConditioning04Name
TextString.String: Air Conditioner OwnGlacier

TextString.Name: AirConditioning04Description
TextString.String:
While glaciers are disappearing all around the world, cutting-edge technology will now let you buy your OwnGlacier and use it to fight the heat!
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: AirConditioning05Name
TextString.String: Air Conditioner Gelato

TextString.Name: AirConditioning05Description
TextString.String:
Everyone loves smooth, cool gelato. Now imagine that same feeling except all over your face! The Gelato AC Unit offers a lovely vanilla-flavored cool breeze!
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Cupboard01Name
TextString.String: Really Traditional Cupboard

TextString.Name: Cupboard01Description
TextString.String:
Already seen this cupboard? Of course you have! According to our stats 97% of all grandparents around the world own this cupboard!
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Cupboard02Name
TextString.String: Long Traditional Cupboard

TextString.Name: Cupboard02Description
TextString.String:
Why settle for a small traditional cupboard when you can buy a LONG cupboard? It's twice as traditional!
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Cupboard03Name
TextString.String: Another Traditional Cupboard

TextString.Name: Cupboard03Description
TextString.String:
Do you want your restaurant to feel familiar? Then why not buy this really standard, classic, traditional cupboard?
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Cupboard04Name
TextString.String: Design Cupboard

TextString.Name: Cupboard04Description
TextString.String:
The minimalistic beauty of this cupboard will let your customers know that you at least you have good taste when it comes to furnishings, no matter how bad your food or service may be.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Cupboard05Name
TextString.String: Tall Traditional Cupboard

TextString.Name: Cupboard05Description
TextString.String:
Another traditional cupboard, but this one is tall instead of small or long! Wow! So much mind-blowingly vertical beauty!
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Cupboard06Name
TextString.String: Another Cupboard

TextString.Name: Cupboard06Description
TextString.String:
Do you feel like there aren't enough cupboards in your restaurant? Do you need ANOTHER one? This is the extra one you've been looking for!
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Cupboard07Name
TextString.String: Tall Royal Cupboard

TextString.Name: Cupboard08
TextString.String: Royal Cupboard

TextString.Name: Cupboard07Description
TextString.String:
Beautiful, yet sober, this royal cupboard will please even the most demanding of your customers.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Cupboard09Name
TextString.String: Cube Cupboard

TextString.Name: Cupboard09Description
TextString.String:
The incredible design of this cubic cupboard will amaze all of your customers!
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Cupboard10Name
TextString.String: Design Cupboard

TextString.Name: Cupboard10Description
TextString.String:
Cupboards need to evolve to survive, and modern design is taking care of that!
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Cupboard11Name
TextString.String: Misplaced Cupboard

TextString.Name: Cupboard11Description
TextString.String:
"You're right! This furniture piece is NOT supposed to be used in restaurants. But, we produced it and now we need to sell it, so..."
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Cupboard12Name
TextString.String: Random Furniture Piece

TextString.Name: Cupboard12Description
TextString.String:
"...I mean, what do customers know about furnishing a restaurant? Just put this shit on sale and call it abstract or modern and someone will buy it!"
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Cupboard13Name
TextString.String: Old Style Cupboard

TextString.Name: Cupboard13Description
TextString.String:
All the beauty of an era long since past is condensed in this unique furniture piece!
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Cupboard14Name
TextString.String: Minimalist Cupboard

TextString.Name: Cupboard14Description
TextString.String:
With its minimalist design, this cupboard is perfect to give a modern touch to your restaurant.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Cupboard15Name
TextString.String: Simple Cupboard

TextString.Name: Cupboard15Description
TextString.String:
Another furniture piece you may want to add to your restaurant. Or not.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Cupboard16Name
TextString.String: Another Simple Cupboard

TextString.Name: Cupboard17Name
TextString.String: Slim Cupboard

TextString.Name: Cupboard17Description
TextString.String:
One day our designers asked, "What if we could use less wood and charge the same price?". They did it! You can buy it now!
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Cupboard19Name
TextString.String: Glass Cupboard

TextString.Name: Cupboard19Description
TextString.String:
Ever wanted to know the contents of a cupboard without the TEDIOUS need of opening it? Now you can!
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Cupboard20Name
TextString.String: Small Cupboard

TextString.Name: Cupboard20Description
TextString.String:
Smaller than most cupboards, this unique furniture piece will surprise your customers!
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Cupboard21Name
TextString.String: Boring Minimal "Thing"

TextString.Name: Cupboard21Description
TextString.String:
"There is literally nothing we can write about this furniture piece..."
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Cupboard22Name
TextString.String: Nostalgic Cupboard

TextString.Name: Cupboard22Description
TextString.String:
Do you miss the good ol' days from before you were even born? You can soothe that overwhelming pain by furnishing your restaurant with pieces like this!
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Cupboard23Name
TextString.String: Decorated Cupboard

TextString.Name: Cupboard23Description
TextString.String:
To create something really unique we downloaded a random pattern from the internet and used it to decorate this unique piece of furniture!
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: TV01Name
TextString.String: Television

TextString.Name: TV01Description
TextString.String:
Are your customers getting bored while waiting? A television is what you need!
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Mirror05Name
TextString.String: Simple Mirror

TextString.Name: Mirror05Description
TextString.String:
Just a mirror, with a really simple design. There is literally nothing fun or interesting you could say about it.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Mirror06Name
TextString.String: Minimal Mirror

TextString.Name: Mirror06Description
TextString.String:
Thanks to its minimal frame, you get 20% more reflective space compared to similar products!
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Mirror08Name
TextString.String: Small Decorated Mirror

TextString.Name: Mirror08Description
TextString.String:
Don't buy a plain, standard mirror when you can buy one with a gorgeous decorated frame like this one!
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Mirror07Name
TextString.String: Small Oval Mirror

TextString.Name: Mirror07Description
TextString.String:
This small mirror, with its oval shape, is mostly a decorative item, being too small and oddly shaped to actually provide a decent mirror experience.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Mirror09Name
TextString.String: Antique Mirror

TextString.Name: Mirror09Description
TextString.String:
A truly original antique mirror, mass produced to give everyone the chance to have it!
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: WineShelves01Name
TextString.String: Wine Bottles Holder

TextString.Name: WineShelves01Description
TextString.String:
The perfect way to store your wine bottles and show them off to your customers at the same time.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: UnlockDecorationTier3Name
TextString.String: IKOA Prestige Furnishing

TextString.Name: UnlockDecorationTier3Description
TextString.String: You think IKOA only makes crappy furniture? Think again! The Prestige Furniture line is here to prove that we DO have high-quality furniture!

TextString.Name: UnlockDecorationTier4Name
TextString.String: FutureTech Furnishing

TextString.Name: UnlockDecorationTier4Description
TextString.String: The past is gone, the future is imminent! FutureTech provides you with a new generation of furniture that looks exactly like the one that is already available, but is also innovative! Can't you see how much better it is?

TextString.Name: UnlockDecorationTier5Name
TextString.String: Hello World Design School

TextString.Name: UnlockDecorationTier5Description
TextString.String: The prestigious Hello World Design School will provide you with their latest furniture prototypes. Admire the brave and daring designs of First-year students and decorate your restaurant with some truly unique furniture!

TextString.Name: UnlockDecorationTier6Name
TextString.String: Ideal Design Decor

TextString.Name: UnlockDecorationTier6Description
TextString.String: Being popular means being able to contact Ideal Design and get your hands on their fantastic furniture. Offer a completely new experience to your customers and amaze them with the greatness of top-notch design!

TextString.Name: UpRankAlertName
TextString.String: Rank Up!

TextString.Name: UpRankAlertDescription
TextString.String: You gained enough popularity to increase your World Chef Ranking!

TextString.Name: DownRankAlertName
TextString.String: Rank Down!

TextString.Name: DownRankAlertescription
TextString.String: You lost some popularity and your World Chef Ranking decreased!
